a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Numeracy skills of adults young adults vs adults, 2015
Numeracy skills are the ability to understand and communicate mathematical information and apply it to real-life
situations and problems. Countries above the diagonal line have young adults (16-24 years) with higher average
numeracy skills than their adult population (15-65 years).
